I Remember

I remember when I was 16 and finally came of age in 2150 B.C. My friend Manishtushu and I went out to Urak by horse for three days. Then some guy named Naram-Sim was on a stage, and before performing, said â€œğ’€­ğ’ˆ¾ğ’Šğ’„ ğ’€­ğ’‚—ğ’ª ğ’ˆ ğ’€­ğ’…–ğ’Œ…ğ’‹¢ğ’Š¬ğ’Š’ğ’„€â€, which really touched me. Then he sang a song.
